about_the_game:
HOMELAND DEFENSE is a satirical action adventure game that makes fun of popular conspiracy theories while immersing the player in relentless vehicle-based combat.

In your idyllic home town in the American Midwest, a pandemic has broken out that is turning people into zombies. To stop the virus from spreading, president Pomp has ordered the national guard to nuke the town and burn it to a cinder – sacrificing any potential survivors in the process. But those said survivors do not comply with that plan. They decide to arm themselves, break through the enemy lines and march on the White House to overthrow the government. On the way, they will be able hijack a wide range of army vehicles including tanks, helicopters, jeeps and fighter planes in order to wreck havoc on the evil president and his minions.

Jump, run and fight your way through hordes of zombies, enemy soldiers and gun turrets to save your home town from being eradicated. Collect pistols, machineguns, flamethrowers and take control of gun towers to increase your firepower. Resist government agents who want to vaccinate you against your will, bring down the patriarchy/matriarchy and also deal with the Illuminati while you’re at it. Zany over-the-top action that will confirm every single conspiracy theory you may have heard of!
